#### Project Summary:

The goal of this project is to make a recommendation to reduce the employee attrition rate in IBM.<br>
<br>
<b>The project components include the following: </b><br>
&nbsp; 1) Using machine learning to predict attrition <br>
&nbsp; 2) Uncovering key factors that lead to attrition <br>
&nbsp; 3) Create a persona that characterizes "high-risk" employees <br> 
&nbsp; 4) Recommendation and limitation. <br>
